duties_responsibilities.duty: Sign-in all visitors who enter and leave the building.
Monitor all exits via surveillance footage and foot patrol during shift.
Update the daily log in detail to pass on information.
Report House Rules violations to the Property Manager.
Take initiative in calling 911 or non-emergency police per protocol and report all building emergencies.
Write up incident reports and route to proper staff per protocol.
Respond to all building emergencies in the absence of On Site Manager or Property Manager.
Maintain orderliness of the front entrance, lobby, and adjoining rooms/areas.
Embody organization values and contribute to a safe and pleasant work environment.
Follow policies, procedures, and safe work practices.

education_certification.credential: Sensitivity to issues facing Family, homeless, disabled, and elderly populations.
Fluency in English and Chinese, Russian, and/or Spanish languages preferred.
